member.name: T:BepInEx.Preloader.EnvVars
member.summary:
Doorstop environment variables, passed into the BepInEx preloader.
https://github.com/NeighTools/UnityDoorstop/wiki#environment-variables

member.name: P:BepInEx.Preloader.EnvVars.DOORSTOP_INVOKE_DLL_PATH
member.summary: Path to the assembly that was invoked via Doorstop. Contains the same value as in "targetAssembly" configuration option in the config file.

member.name: P:BepInEx.Preloader.EnvVars.DOORSTOP_MANAGED_FOLDER_DIR
member.summary: Full path to the game's "Managed" folder that contains all the game's managed assemblies

member.name: P:BepInEx.Preloader.EnvVars.DOORSTOP_PROCESS_PATH
member.summary: Full path to the game executable currently running.

member.name: T:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.AssemblyPatcherDelegate
member.summary: Delegate used in patching assemblies.
member.param: The assembly that is being patched.

member.name: T:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.AssemblyPatcher
member.summary: Worker class which is used for loading and patching entire folders of assemblies, or alternatively patching and loading assemblies one at a time.

member.name: P:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.AssemblyPatcher.PatcherPlugins
member.summary: List of all patcher plugins to be applied

member.name: M:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.AssemblyPatcher.AddPatcher(BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.PatcherPlugin)
member.summary: Adds a single assembly patcher to the pool of applicable patches.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.AssemblyPatcher.AddPatchersFromDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Adds all patchers from all managed assemblies specified in a directory.
member.param: Directory to search patcher DLLs from.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.AssemblyPatcher.DisposePatchers
member.summary: Releases all patchers to let them be collected by GC.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.AssemblyPatcher.PatchAndLoad(System.String)
member.summary: Applies patchers to all assemblies in the given directory and loads patched assemblies into memory.
member.param: Directory to load CLR assemblies from.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.AssemblyPatcher.Load(Mono.Cecil.AssemblyDefinition,System.String)
member.summary: Loads an individual assembly definition into the CLR.
member.param: File name of the assembly being loaded.

member.name: T:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.PatcherPlugin
member.summary: A single assembly patcher.

member.name: P:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.PatcherPlugin.TargetDLLs
member.summary: Target assemblies to patch.

member.name: P:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.PatcherPlugin.Initializer
member.summary: Initializer method that is run before any patching occurs.

member.name: P:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.PatcherPlugin.Finalizer
member.summary: Finalizer method that is run after all patching is done.

member.name: P:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.PatcherPlugin.Patcher
member.summary: The main patcher method that is called on every DLL defined in .

member.name: P:BepInEx.Preloader.Patching.PatcherPlugin.TypeName
member.summary: Type name of the patcher.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Preloader.Entrypoint.Main
member.summary: The main entrypoint of BepInEx, called from Doorstop.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Preloader.PlatformUtils.SetPlatform
member.summary: Recreation of MonoMod's PlatformHelper.DeterminePlatform method, but with libc calls instead of creating processes.

member.name: T:BepInEx.Preloader.RuntimeFixes.TraceFix
member.summary: This exists because the Mono implementation of is/was broken, and would call Write directly instead of calling TraceEvent.

member.name: T:BepInEx.Preloader.Preloader
member.summary: The main entrypoint of BepInEx, and initializes all patchers and the chainloader.

member.name: P:BepInEx.Preloader.Preloader.PreloaderLog
member.summary: The log writer that is specific to the preloader.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Preloader.Preloader.PatchEntrypoint(Mono.Cecil.AssemblyDefinition@)
member.summary: Inserts BepInEx's own chainloader entrypoint into UnityEngine.
member.param: The assembly that will be attempted to be patched.

member.name: M:BepInEx.Preloader.Preloader.AllocateConsole
member.summary: Allocates a console window for use by BepInEx safely.

member.name: T:BepInEx.Preloader.PreloaderConsoleListener
member.summary: Log listener that listens to logs during preloading time and buffers messages for output in Unity logs later.
